doc:
John Hillerman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hillerman 0 John Benedict Hillerman (December 20, 1932 – November 9, 2017) was an American actor best known for his starring role as Jonathan Quayle Higgins III on the television show Magnum, P.I. that aired from 1980 to 1988. For his role as Higgins, Hillerman earned five Golden Globe nominations, winning in 1981, and four Emmy nominations, winning in 1987. He retired from acting in 1999. John_Benedict_Hillerman ( December_20_,_1932 – November_9_,_2017 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_starring_role as Jonathan_Quayle_Higgins_III on the_television_show_Magnum_,_P.I. that aired from 1980 to 1988 . For his_role as Higgins , Hillerman earned five_Golden_Globe_nominations , winning in 1981 , and four_Emmy_nominations , winning in 1987 . He retired from acting in 1999 .
